title: My Acount Was Made Season 1 But Dont Have UFO Corki???

embed.description: PapiLongSword's League of Legends statistics. Discover how PapiLongSword plays. Learn their best, their worst; all PapiLongSword's stats history and game records!

body:
Riot can i please get the skin i was supposed to get because i dont have it and i really want it. I have judment kael as proof im season one vet but i dont have ufo corki you said any account made before 14th 2014 was getting ufo corki free and ive had my account way before then but dont have the skin so please help me. Heres a link to my skins so you can check yourself.
http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/summoner/na/20005446/skins
please fix this i put tons of time and money into this game as you can see and would like the skin i should've already recieved thank you for your help.

replies.body:
*Zombiemaster* is correct, the year was 2010, not 2014. You can find the original announcement for this skin [here.](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=58736&highlight=ufo+corki+skin)

Let me know if you have any questions.

i got the year wrong but like i said ive had my account since 2010 season 1 are you tlling me that it wasnt made before January 14? because im sure it was and im pretty sure ive made it in 2009 or the begining of 2010 bc my cousin got really hype for it and mad me sign up with him i remeber ranked didnt even exist yet

Account Creation Date:  Much later than February of 2010

It seems like you were many months late :(

Wish I had better news!
Wait I thought giving out account creation dates publicly is a big no-no isn't that used during the account recovery process?
I was actually under the impression they couldn't give it out even privately for that reason.
do you really expect me to know my account creation date if i were to need to recover my account?

If you've kept that email account, shouldn't be too hard to search for.

Edit: Also, a lot of us remember the first new champ that came out when we started playing.

> you said any account made before 14th 2014 was getting ufo corki free

Umm.... no, that's not the date. To get UFO Corki, you had to have created your account before January 14th _**2010**_, not 2014.
When did they say that they will give UFO corki. You probably misheard it..
